channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Dow Jumps About 1400 Points, Bonds Tumble on Trump Win
item.description: The Dow industrials surged to their biggest gain in two years, with the dollar and bitcoin also posting sharp climbs.

item.title: Stocks soar, but bond yields ‘headed in wrong direction’: What’s next for markets after Trump victory
item.description: The question for investors is what happens once the postelection euphoria wears off.

item.title: Small-cap stocks are ripping higher after Trump’s win. What history tells us might happen next.
item.description: The Russell 2000 index jumped 5.5% on Wednesday after former President Donald Trump’s electoral win.

item.title: Wall Street believes stocks will keep climbing on Trump victory — but here’s what could potentially hurt them
item.description: Many on Wall Street expected Tuesday’s election would be the final obstacle standing in the way of a stock-market melt-up heading into the end of the ...

item.title: Dow Surges, Bonds Tumble After Trump Is Elected President
item.description: U.S. stock indexes jumped as the Dow industrials gained more than 3%. Investors are piling into trades that align with a second Trump presidency.

item.title: Markets look past Trump tariffs, but they could be ‘life or death’ for some companies
item.description: Donald Trump’s most consistent policy commitment is to tariffs, or taxes paid by U.S. importers of foreign goods.

item.title: Trump’s economic team: Who could run Treasury, the Fed and energy in his second term
item.description: Even before Donald Trump was called the winner of Tuesday’s election, names had been circulating about who the Republican nominee would appoint to key...

item.title: Speed of Trump Policy Plans Will Steer Dollar Rally
item.description: The U.S. dollar is off to a strong start under President-Elect Donald Trump, but the path forward from here will greatly depend on the pace of policy ...

item.title: Trump Will Create New Winners and Losers in Healthcare
item.description: Market reactions sharply diverged among healthcare companies as investors expect changes to Obamacare and Medicare.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled nearly 2.7% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 4.4%, down five of the past six sessions.
